title: True friend
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child psychology

abstract: 'I had to eventually go up to someone and say something.'
description: Moving to a new city and making new friends is never easy, and Elizabeth Phan found it particularly difficult. Gradually, though, Phan was able to learn the meaning of the words 'true friend'.
